co2-calculation: Annahme: 49% Sojabohnen, 50% Weissmehl, 1% Salz + Energie für die Produktion + Glasflasche. 8576t CO2 * 0.9 = 7718.4 t CO2 für die Produktion von 46803 kL = 0.165 CO2äq für Produktion pro Liter soja sauce. Sojabohnen 0.54*0.49 + Weissmehl 0.596*0.5 + 0.3*0.01 + 0.165 = 0.7306 kg CO2äq/L + 0.6 für die Flasche = 1.33 kg CO2äq/L
references: 1. Luh 1995. Industrial production of soy sauce. Journal of Industrial Microbiology 14, 467-471. -> general background info2. Shoda Shoyu Co., LTD. Environmental Report 2013, energy use, page 5: 46803 kl Soy Sauce and 5397 kL soups cause 8576 t CO2. 3. Ardente et al., 2006. POEMS: A case study of an Italian wine producing firm -> page 359, last part and 360 first part. Difference between loose wine 1 kg CO2äq and bottled wine 1.6 kg CO2äq
calculation-process-documentation: The sauce is made by fermentation of a combination of soy beans and wheat in water and salt. In the process apart from soy sauce a cake for animal feed is produced. Fermentation process is 4 months.
